name: Create or Update Iterable users from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new user in Iterable or update existing user. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ryfH3-KjD0bkYHH-lScgA-2P6ApnJCfGqdVC7eAw90E/edit?usp=sharing).
